Attrs.tooltip: Clock attributes: (M) Master clock, (G) Generated clock, (&) Internal generated clock, (U) User defined skew group, (D) Default skew group, (*) Generated clock balanced separately.  Also shows 'Corner' for the parent row of all clocks of that corner, and 'Mode' for the parent row of all clocks of that mode for its parent corner.

Sinks.tooltip: Number of sinks for this clock

TranDRCs.tooltip: Number of transition DRC violations in this clock tree

TranWNS.tooltip: Worst slack transition DRC violation in this clock tree

TranCost.tooltip: Total slack of transition DRC violations in this clock tree

CapDRCs.tooltip: Number of capacitance DRC violations in this clock tree

CapWNS.tooltip: Worst slack capacitance DRC violation in this clock tree

CapCost.tooltip: Total slack of capacitance DRC violations in this clock tree

FanoutDRCs.tooltip: Number of fanout DRC violations in this clock tree

FanoutWNS.tooltip: Worst slack fanout DRC violation in this clock tree

FanoutCost.tooltip: Total slack of fanout DRC violations in this clock tree

LengthDRCs.tooltip: Number of length DRC violations in this clock tree

LengthWNS.tooltip: Worst slack length DRC violation in this clock tree

LengthCost.tooltip: Total slack of length DRC violations in this clock tree
